> **instant Bible Verse Display**, thanks to reactive *observableJS* branch of accuVerse.

::: {#inputDiv}
<!-- inputDiv is considered Void-->
:::

```{ojs}
import { Inputs } from "@observablehq/inputs";
import { html } from "@observablehq/stdlib";
import { Bcve, Ref } from "./BibleBooksCodes_Tables.js";


//================== 1. INPUTS
// Editable input field

viewof RefInput = Inputs.text({
    value: "ps42:1!KJV",
    style: "width: 150px;"
    })

//================== 2. ACCUMULATION
viewof RefAccu = {
    const mibutton = Inputs.button("Keep", {
      value: [],
      reduce: (list) => {
        const input = viewof RefInput.value;
        const validated = new Bcve(input);
        const result = validated.is_valid ? [validated.param, ...list ] : [...list]
        return result
        }
      })
//    mibutton.querySelector('button').classList.add("btn", "btn-warning");
    mibutton.classList.add("btn", "btn-warning");
    return mibutton};

viewof miform = Inputs.form({
  enter: RefInput,
  button: RefAccu
  },
  {
//    layout: html`<div style="display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center;"></div>`
    layout: html`<div class="row-container"></div>`
  })

```
